languages.text: "Вы неверно расставили акценты. Это я собираюсь помочь Вашей Светлости. Я вами недоволен. От Теодоры вам досталась некоторая репутация, а вы ее изрядно подпортили. В сложившейся непростой обстановке человек, подобный мне, мог бы решить, что {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}человека, подобного вам{/d}, надо превентивно умертвить, не дожидаясь, пока он{mf||а} выкинет какой-нибудь вредный фокус".

"You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Вы неверно расставили акценты. Это я собираюсь помочь Вашей Светлости. Я вами недоволен. От Теодоры вам досталась некоторая репутация, а вы ее изрядно подпортили. В сложившейся непростой обстановке человек, подобный мне, мог бы решить, что {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}человека, подобного вам{/d}, надо превентивно умертвить, не дожидаясь, пока он{mf||а} выкинет какой-нибудь вредный фокус".

You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly deleterious."

Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly deleterious."

Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly deleterious."

"You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

languages.text: “你误会了我的意思。并不是你要帮我，而是我想帮你，大人。我对你感到很不满。你从西奥多拉那里继承了一定程度的声誉，可你却彻彻底底地玷污了她的声誉。在如今这种危急的情况下，若是换做其他审判官，可能会决定将你立刻除之后快，以免你的行为带来{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}真正的灾祸{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “你误会了我的意思。并不是你要帮我，而是我想帮你，大人。我对你感到很不满。你从西奥多拉那里继承了一定程度的声誉，可你却彻彻底底地玷污了她的声誉。在如今这种危急的情况下，若是换做其他审判长，可能会决定将你立刻除之后快，以免你的行为带来真正的灾祸。”

languages.text: «Me malinterpreta. Soy yo quien va ayudarl{mf|e|a} a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Estoy muy decepcionado. Heredó una cierta reputación de Theodora y la ha echado a perder por completo. En circunstancias como estas, alguien en mi posición podría verse tentado a ordenar su muerte antes de que sus acciones sean un verdadero {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}problema{/d}».
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «Me malinterpreta. Soy yo quien va ayudarl{mf|e|a} a usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Estoy muy decepcionado. Heredó una cierta reputación de Theodora y la ha echado a perder por completo. En circunstancias como estas, alguien en mi posición podría verse tentado a ordenar su muerte antes de que sus acciones sean un verdadero problema».

languages.text: 「勘違いしているな。私がお前に手を貸そうというのだ、陛下よ。私はお前に嫌気がさしている。シオドーラから名声を引き継ぎながら、それを徹底的におとしめている。ここまで厳しい状況では、私の立場にある者ならばお前が真に{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}有害{/d}な行動を起こす前に殺すべきだと判断するかもしれないというのに」
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「勘違いしているな。私がお前に手を貸そうというのだ、陛下よ。私はお前に嫌気がさしている。シオドーラから名声を引き継ぎながら、それを徹底的におとしめている。ここまで厳しい状況では、私の立場にある者ならばお前が真に{d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}有害{/d}な行動を起こす前に殺すべきだと判断するかもしれないというのに」

languages.text: « Vous m'avez mal compris. C'est moi qui cherche à vous aider, Votre Seigneurie. Votre travail ne me satisfait pas. Vous avez reçu la réputation de Théodora en héritage, et depuis lors, vous la piétinez sans réfléchir. Au vu de cette situation délicate, quelqu'un dans ma position pourrait décider que vous méritez la mort avant que vos actions ne deviennent réellement {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}délétères{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez mal compris. C'est moi qui cherche à vous aider, Votre Seigneurie. Votre travail ne me satisfait pas. Vous avez reçu la réputation de Théodora en héritage, et depuis lors, vous la piétinez sans réfléchir. Au vu de cette situation délicate, quelqu'un dans ma position pourrait décider que vous méritez la mort avant que vos actions ne deviennent réellement nuisibles. »

languages.text: "Ihr irrt Euch. Ich werde Euch helfen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin unzufrieden mit Euch. Ihr habt von Theodora einen gewissen Ruf geerbt und ihn komplett ruiniert. Unter so schwierigen Umständen wie jetzt könnte eine Person in meiner Stellung entscheiden, Euch zu töten, bevor Euer Handeln noch {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}schädlichere Auswirkungen{/d} hat."
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr irrt Euch. Ich werde Euch helfen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin unzufrieden mit Euch. Ihr habt von Theodora einen gewissen Ruf geerbt und ihn komplett ruiniert. Unter so schwierigen Umständen wie jetzt könnte eine Person in meiner Stellung entscheiden, Euch zu töten, bevor Euer Handeln noch schädlichere Auswirkungen hat."

languages.text: "Beni yanlış anlamışsın. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, asıl ben sana yardım etmek isterim. Beni yüzüstü bıraktın. Theodora'dan miras kalan itibarı iyice zedeledin. Bu zor şartlar altında benim yerimde başkası olsa... Yaptıkların {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}daha zararlı{/d} hâle gelmeden kelleni almıştı bile."
languages.original_text: "You have misconstrued me. It is I who intend to help you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am displeased with you. You inherited a certain reputation from Theodora, and you have thoroughly tarnished that reputation. Under these difficult circumstances, a person in my position might decide that you ought to be killed before your actions become truly {d|Encyclopedia:Conviction_Heretical3OrMore}deleterious{/d}."
